reviewText: I use this dvd for my painting projects, being an amatuer painter, i loved watching them on saturdays and i have been looking at a lot of places before i started shopping on this sight. Now i can make happy little clouds
Title: Bob Ross Joy of Painting Series: Beginner's 3-Hour Workshop English

reviewText: This is a nice video depicting many of the techniques that Mr.Ross used in his paintings. You'll see and get to try a variety of paintings. This was a perfect gift for our artsy daughter. And...I just love to watch this gentle man paint beauty.
Title: Bob Ross Joy of Painting Series: Beginner's 3-Hour Workshop English

reviewText: I initially purchased this product for myself.  When I watched the DVD and discovered what a gem I had discovered, I ordered another copy for a friend.  If you enjoy painting, then this product is for you.  Whether you are a beginner or advanced painter, you will find something in this video, just for you.
Title: Bob Ross Joy of Painting Series: Beginner's 3-Hour Workshop English

reviewText: This Bob Ross dvd helped me to see what I was doing wrong, so that I could fix my mistakes and learn how to make simple changes to any picture that I wanted to paint.
Title: Bob Ross Joy of Painting Series: Beginner's 3-Hour Workshop English

reviewText: This brought back memories of watching this with my daughter. I don't even paint. I'll just put it on sometimes if I'm stressed, and it will calm me down.
summary: What's not to like about Bob Ross
Title: Bob Ross Joy of Painting Series: Beginner's 3-Hour Workshop English

reviewText: A really good set for any painter, whether a new or old painter. Instructions and techniques are very helpful and easy to understand
Title: Bob Ross Joy of Painting Series: Beginner's 3-Hour Workshop English

reviewText: Bought this for my granddaughter to celebrate her interest in painting. It takes her father to sit down with her to view this weird looking guy with the fuzzy hair as she remarked.
Title: Bob Ross Joy of Painting Series: Beginner's 3-Hour Workshop English

reviewText: This product is a joy to watch! It's easy to follow and understand. And I'm using it to teach myself to paint. Bob Ross explains each brush stroke clearly and demonstrates what he is saying. And it's all done with humor and light heartedness. I plan to buy more of the DVD's of his TV show.
Title: Bob Ross Joy of Painting Series: Beginner's 3-Hour Workshop English

reviewText: I liked the DVD and learned a lot. The price was much more affordable then in a local Hobby Lobby store. Thank you.
Title: Bob Ross Joy of Painting Series: Beginner's 3-Hour Workshop English

reviewText: This DVD is pretty informative for a beginning painter but not for an advanced student.Paul Baragona  Raleigh, NC  USA
Title: Bob Ross Joy of Painting Series: Beginner's 3-Hour Workshop English

reviewText: This is an amazing crash course in Bob Ross' painting techniques.  The DVD is broken down into skies, mountains, water, trees...  And he shows you different types of each, sharing techniques to achieve different effects in your painting.Great tutor!  Bob makes it look so easy.
summary: Try not to get paint on your TV : )
Title: Bob Ross Joy of Painting Series: Beginner's 3-Hour Workshop English

reviewText: I'm a novice painter but after watching this very educational and easy to follow DVD, I've really improved.  One of the most important things I learned is to use oil paint along with a white primer on your canvas.  That is how you get the effects Bob creates.  Acrylics just don't work for me.In this DVD, you will learn how to create mountains, waters, trees, skies, and how to fix commonly made errors.  I can't brag on this DVD enough.  It is a must have for every beginning painter.
Title: Bob Ross Joy of Painting Series: Beginner's 3-Hour Workshop English
